item.title:
RT by @G1RLRAY: We teamed up with Fender artists to share their favorite riffs, techniques and tips. Poppy Hankin of @G1RLRAY shows off a few different techniques for adding rhythm to a song when playing the classic disco chord structure.

Full Lesson: https://bit.ly/31hpYbY
item.dc:creator: @Fender
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @G1RLRAY: We teamed up with Fender artists to share their favorite riffs, techniques and tips. Poppy Hankin of @G1RLRAY plays through disco classic "I'm Coming Out" by Diana Ross and explains the rhythmic best practices of disco guitar.

Full Lesson: https://bit.ly/3EvxCgy
item.dc:creator: @Fender
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @G1RLRAY: .@G1RLRAY's brilliant take on @SophieEB's evergreen pop banger 'Murder On The Dancefloor' comes complete with a hilarious office Christmas party themed video...

Trivia note: it was shot in our building! LOL!

item.title:
RT by @G1RLRAY: It's another sad year for Christmas office parties ... but at least we got that new @G1RLRAY clip that celebrates that infamous tradition.

And yes, that's indeed a cover of THE evergreen "Murder On The Dancefloor" you're about to experience: https://youtu.be/6Rjtj5fYPZE
item.dc:creator: @messcalledmusic
